lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the defendant, Pedro Hernandez, had sought to bar Joan Illuzzi for her comments about the case during her political campaign last year.

headline.main: Prosecutor in Etan Patz Trial May Participate in Retrial, Judge Rules

snippet: Lawyers for the defendant, Pedro Hernandez, had sought to bar Joan Illuzzi for her comments about the case during her political campaign last year.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Maxwell Wiley rules Manhattan Dist Atty Joan Illuzzi can participate in retrial of Pedro Hernandez in case regarding killing of Etan Patz in 1979; defense had sought to bar Illuzzi from participating because of statements she made while running for Staten Island district attorney's office.
